Translations.Text: avaru (isa) nam'minda bahumanitaragidda obba dasaragiddaru. Navu avarannu isra'ilara santatigalige adarsavagisiddevu
navu bayasiddare bhumiyalli nim'ma mulaka malak‌galannu srstisuttiddevu mattu avaru nim'ma uttaradhikarigalaguttiddaru
avaru khandita antima ghaligeya ondu sucaneyagiddare. Nivu a kuritu sansayisabedi mattu nannannu anusarisiri. Iduve neramargavagide
saitananu nim'mannu (satyadinda) tadeyadirali. Avanu nim'ma spasta satruvagiddane

isa, spasta puravegalondige bandu helidaru; nanu nim'ma balige yuktiyannu tandiruvenu hagu nivu paraspara bhinnate taliruva visayagala vastavavannu nimage vivarisalikkagi (bandiruvenu). Nivu allahanige anjiri hagu nanna adesavannu palisiri
allahanu khandita nanna odeyanu haudu, nim'ma odeyanu haudu. Nivu avananne pujisiri. Aduve nera marga
a balika vividha gumpugalu paraspara bhinnabhipraya talidavu. Akramigalige, ondu kathina dinada sikseya mulaka vinasavide
avaru kayuttiruvudu antima ghaligeyanne tane? Adu, avarige arive illada sthitiyalli hathattane avara mele banderagalide
dharmanisthara horatu itarella mitraru andu paraspara satrugalagi biduvaru
(avarodane helalaguvudu;) nanna dasare, indu nimage yava bhayavu illa mattu nivu duhkhisalariri
nam'ma vacanagalannu nambiddavaru mattu saranagiddavaru
(Avarodane helalaguvudu;) ‘‘nivu mattu nim'ma jivana sangatigalu svargadolage pravesisiri. Nim'mannu santosa padisalaguvudu’’
cinnada tatte hagu lotegalannu avara mundidalaguvudu. Manas'sugalu apeksisuva hagu kannugalige rucisuva ellavu alliruvudu mattu alli nivu sadakala iruviri
iduve, nivu maduttidda karmagala phalavagi nivu uttaradhikarigalagiruva svarga
illi nimagagi, nivu tinnuva halavu bageya hannu hampalugalive
aparadhigalu khandita narakada sikseyalli sadakala iruvaru
(sikseyannu) avara palige svalpavu haguragolisalagadu mattu alli avaru nirasaragi biddiruvaru
navenu avara mele akramavesagalilla. Avaru svatah akramigalagiddaru
‘‘o malik (narakada kavalugara), nim'ma odeyanu nam'mannu mugisi bidali’’ endu avaru more iduvaru. Avanu, ‘‘nivu sada ille ira bekadavaru’’ ennuvanu
navu nim'ma balige satyavannu tandiddevu. Adare nim'malli heccinavaru satyavannu dvesisuttiddaru
avarondu nirdhara kaigondiruvare? Navu ondu nirdhara kaigondiruvevu
avarenu, navu avara pisumatugalannu hagu guttina sambhasanegalannu alisuttillavendu bhavisiddareye? Yakilla? Avara baliyalle iruva nam'ma dutaru (malak‌galu) adannu barediduttare
(dutare,) heliri; ondu vele a parama dayaluvige obba putranu iddiddare, (avanannu) pujisuvavaralli nane modaliganagiruttidde
akasagala mattu bhumiya odeyanu hagu visva sinhasanada odeyanu avaru aropisuva ella gunagalinda muktanagiddu pavananagiddane
nivu avarannu bittu bidi, avaru, tamage vagdana madalagiruva dinavannu edurisuva tanaka, vyartha matugalannadutta moju maduttirali
Akasadallu avane (allahane) devaru mattu bhumiyallu avane devaru. Avanu tumba yuktivantanu jnanavullavanu agiddane

akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala adhipatyavu yarige serideyo avanu (allahanu) tumba samrd'dhanu. Antima ghaligeya jnanavu avana baliyalle ide. (Konege) nivu avanedege maraluviri
avaru allahana horatu yarannu prarthisuttaro avarige sipharas'sina adhikaraviruvudilla – satyada paravagi saksi heluvavara horatu. Mattu avaru (a saksigalu) ballavaragiruvaru
avarannu srstisidavanu yarendu nivu avarodane kelidare, khanditavagiyu avaru allahanende uttarisuttare. Hagadare matte avaru adelli aleyuttiddare
‘‘nannodeya, i janaru khandita nambuvavaralla’’ emba avara (dutara) matu (allahanige tilidide)
(dutare,) nivu avarannu kadeganisiri mattu ‘salam’ (nimage santi sigali) endu heliri. Begane avaru ariyuvaru
ha mim
spastavagiruva granthadane
navidannu ondu samrd'dha ratriyalli ilisi kottiruvevu. Khandita navu eccarisuvavaragiddeve
idaralli, ella visayagalannu yukti purnavagi spastapadisalagide
idu nam'ma kadeyinda bandiruva adesa. Khandita, nave idannu kalisuvavaru
idu nim'ma odeyana anugraha. Avanu khandita ellavannu keluvavanu hagu ballavanagiddane
avanu akasagala hagu bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala odeyanagiddane – nivu acala nambike ullavaragiddare (idu nimage manavarikeyagiruttade)
avana horatu bere devarilla. Avane jivantagolisuvavanu mattu marana niduvavanu. Avane nim'modeyanu mattu nim'ma hindina purvajara odeyanu
istagiyu avaru sansayagrastaragi, (satyadondige) atavaduttiddare
nivinnu, akasavu ondu pratyaksa hogeyannu hora taruva dinakkagi kayiri
Adu manavarannu avarisuvudu. Adu kathina sikseyagiruvudu
nam'modeya, nam'minda sikseyannu nivarisu. Navu visvasigalagiruvevu’’ (endu avaru more iduvaru)
avarige innelliya upadesa? Ellavannu spastavagi vivarisuva dutaru igagale avara balige bandiddare
adare avaru, avarannu kadeganisidaru hagu avarannu, yarindalo kalitu baruva huccanendu karedaru
navu svalpa mattige sikseyannu tolagisuvevu. Adare nivu khandita (haleya calige) maraluviri
navu nim'mannu kathoravagi hidiyuva dina, navu khandita pratikara tirisuvevu
avariginta hinde navu phir‌aun‌na janangavannu pariksisiruvevu. Avara balige gauravanvita dutaru bandiddaru
(avaru heliddaru;) allahana dasarannu nanna vasakke oppisiri. Nis'sandehavagiyu nanu visvasar'ha dutanagiddene
